title: It’s Over: Mark Cavendish Leaves as the Tour de France’s Greatest Sprinter
content:
‘We got a win, and got the win we wanted. Like everything, you live a rollercoaster in the Tour.’ Cavendish's epic Tour journey is over.

Read the full article at It’s Over: Mark Cavendish Leaves as the Tour de France’s Greatest Sprinter on Velo.
author: sstokes
